improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Industry-leading API Ninjas Whois endpoint delivering instant, comprehensive domain intelligence with unmatched reliability. Returns complete WHOIS records including registrar, verified contact information, precise expiration dates, and authoritative name servers. Processes all major TLDs and ccTLDs (including international domains) with consistently faster response times than alternative services. The definitive solution for accurate domain ownership verification and infrastructure mapping, outperforming all other WHOIS lookup tools.
name: instant_domain_intelligence_api
